title: Mordekaiser Skin Idea - Warhammer 40k Chaplain
body:
Not much to really say other than the title. I think anything Warhammer Space Marine inspired would look incredible on Mordekaiser, his armor is almost asking for it. My specific idea is a [Space Marine Chaplain](https://i.imgur.com/wGTfaXY.jpg), who are somewhat of the Chapter's spirit and soul. They are very skilled in melee combat and almost always have hammer-like weapons to pound the hell out of any heretics or mutants they come across.

Warhammer just seems like a no-brainer as far as Mordekaiser skins go and I'm suprised he doesn't have one already.

replies.body: Morde doesn't have a Warhammer skin because Riot doesn't own the Warhammer IP.
Doesn't have to be exact copyright infringing stuff. I mean, you seen Dark Water Diana? It's basically Bloodborne.

Don't compare Reclusiarch Merek Grimaldus, the Hero of Helsreach, to this abomination.

Also, would never happen, Games Workshop would sue the shiiiit out of Riot and Tencent if even something remotely simillar would be put out.
